name: 雅思核心词汇
description: 包含雅思考试中常见的高频词汇

words.example: Scientists are studying this unusual natural phenomenon.
words.exampleTranslation: 科学家们正在研究这种不寻常的自然现象。

words.example: We need to develop more sustainable energy sources.
words.exampleTranslation: 我们需要开发更多可持续的能源。

words.example: His latest book deals with controversial political issues.
words.exampleTranslation: 他最新的书探讨了有争议的政治问题。

words.example: Birds' annual migration is triggered by changing seasons.
words.exampleTranslation: 鸟类的年度迁徙是由季节变化触发的。

words.example: Globalization has increased trade between countries.
words.exampleTranslation: 全球化增加了国家之间的贸易。

words.example: The country is investing heavily in transportation infrastructure.
words.exampleTranslation: 该国正大力投资交通基础设施。

words.example: Technological innovation has transformed our daily lives.
words.exampleTranslation: 技术创新已经改变了我们的日常生活。

words.example: Wearing a helmet while cycling is mandatory in some countries.
words.exampleTranslation: 在一些国家，骑自行车时戴头盔是强制性的。

words.example: The selection criteria for the program are very strict.
words.exampleTranslation: 该项目的选拔标准非常严格。

words.example: The company has achieved unprecedented success this year.
words.exampleTranslation: 公司今年取得了前所未有的成功。

words.example: There has been a significant increase in online shopping.
words.exampleTranslation: 网上购物显著增加。

words.example: Education is a fundamental right for all children.
words.exampleTranslation: 教育是所有儿童的基本权利。

words.example: Safety is our top priority in all operations.
words.exampleTranslation: 安全是我们所有操作中的首要任务。

words.example: His actions had serious consequences for everyone involved.
words.exampleTranslation: 他的行为对所有相关人员产生了严重后果。

words.example: The scientists developed a new methodology for analyzing the data.
words.exampleTranslation: 科学家们开发了一种新的数据分析方法。

words.example: The software is designed to integrate with existing systems.
words.exampleTranslation: 该软件设计用于与现有系统集成。

words.example: The project requires a substantial investment of time and money.
words.exampleTranslation: 该项目需要大量的时间和金钱投入。

words.example: It's important to consider the issue from different perspectives.
words.exampleTranslation: 从不同角度考虑问题很重要。

words.example: The implementation of the new policy will begin next month.
words.exampleTranslation: 新政策的实施将于下个月开始。

words.example: Diversification of investments can reduce financial risk.
words.exampleTranslation: 投资多样化可以降低财务风险。
